lead_paragraph: Police in Rio de Janeiro said a Russian diplomat trying to repel an attempted robbery Thursday near the Olympic Park was involved in a shooting that left the assailant dead. The Russian embassy denied any of its employees were involved in the incident.

headline.print_headline: Rio Police, Russian Embassy Disagree on Details of Fatality
headline.main: Rio Police, Russian Embassy Disagree on Details of Fatality
